localResource.name: Cluster
localResource.label: Cluster
localResource.queryString: Select distinct cluster_id, delete_date, CASE WHEN delete_date IS NULL THEN cluster_name ELSE cluster_name || ' (Removed on ' || cast(delete_date as varchar) || ')' END as combo_name, 0 as sort from v3_0_cluster_configuration_view WHERE cluster_id in (SELECT DISTINCT cluster_id FROM v3_0_vm_configuration_view) AND datacenter_id = CASE WHEN $P{P_DataCenter_ID} IS NULL then cast('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as uuid) WHEN upper($P{P_DataCenter_ID}) like 'UN%' then cast('00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as uuid) ELSE cast($P{P_DataCenter_ID} as uuid) END AND history_id in (SELECT max(a.history_id) FROM v3_0_cluster_configuration_view a GROUP BY a.cluster_id) $P!{Active_VMs} UNION ALL SELECT distinct cast('11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111' as uuid), cast(null as timestamp), value, 1 FROM v3_0_enum_translator_view WHERE enum_type = 'REPORTS_ALL' AND enum_key = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC, delete_date DESC, combo_name
